title: Create a Historic Non-FHL UK Property Income & Expenses Period Summary
description: This endpoint allows a developer to create income, and expenses  for their non-FHL UK property business to make periodic submission for tax years from 2017-18 to 2021-22. A National Insurance number must be provided. The new Property specification endpoints should be used to create periodic submissions for the current tax year.

periodId.description: An identifier for the update period, unique to the UK business property.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource.

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource.
